snippet: LASHINE--Selma, on January 5, 2016. Beloved wife of the late David. Devoted mother of Carol Ellis, Nancy Lashine and the late William. Mother-in-law to Stephen Ellis and Gary Sher. Cherished grandmother of Jeffrey and Claudia Ellis, Diana, Julia and David Sher. Services today, 1pm, at "The Riverside," 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave. Donations in her memory may be made to Hunter College Foundation-Selma Lashine Scholarship Fund. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LASHINE--Selma, on January 5, 2016. Beloved wife of the late David. Devoted mother of Carol Ellis, Nancy Lashine and the late William. Mother-in-law to Stephen Ellis and Gary Sher. Cherished grandmother of Jeffrey and Claudia Ellis, Diana, Julia and David Sher. Services today, 1pm, at "The Riverside," 76th St. and Amsterdam Ave. Donations in her memory may be made to Hunter College Foundation-Selma Lashine Scholarship Fund. 1/3
